full_text: Screened by NARA, 7/24/2023 UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE INMIGRATION AND NATURALIZATION SERVICE DUPLICATE UNITED STATES OF AMERICA (To accompany monthly report on Form N-4) PETITION FOR NATURALIZATION No. 330160 To the Honorable U.S. District Court, Los Angeles, Calif. The Court of at This petition for naturalization, hereby made and filed under section 316a Immigration and Nationality Act, respectfully shows: (1) My full, true, and correct name is MAN GET WONG (2) My present place of residence is 854 N. Crescent Hets Blvd. (Full. true name. without abbreviation) Los Angeles, Calif. 90046 (Apt. No.) Number and street) (City or town) (County) (State) (ZIP Code) (3) I was born) on Aug. 22 gin 1914 (Month) (Day) (Year) (City or town) Kyang Tung China (County, district. province. or State) (Country) (4) I am married, and have living children. (5) I was lawfully admitted to the United States for permanent residence on April 8, 66 19 and have not abandoned such residence. (6) My present nationality is China ALIEN REGISTRATION NO. A13-559-853-ca (7) I have not heretofore made a petition for naturalization. (8) I pray that my name be changed to none (continued over) AFFIDAVIT OF WITNESSES The following witnesses, each being severally, duly, and respectively sworn, depose and say: (1) My name is Chow Fong Lew I reside at 2314 Moreno Dr, LA, Calif. and (Number and "Edmund T. Lew (City or town) (State) (2) My name is I reside at 2419 Meadow Valley, Terrace, LA, Calif. (Number and street) (City or Town) (State) I am a citizen of the United States of America: I have personally known and have been acquainted in the United States with the petitioner named in the petition for naturalization of which this affidavit is a part, since at least 12 66 : to my personal knowledge (Month) (Day) (Year) the petitioner has resided, immediately preceding the date of filing this petition. in the United States continuously since the date last mentioned: that the petitioner has been physically present in the United States for at least 31 months of that period: and that the petitioner has been a resident in the State in which the petition is filed during at least the last 6 months. I have personal knowledge that the petitioner is, and during all such periods has been a person of good moral character, attached to the principles of the Constitution of the United States, and well disposed to the good order and happiness of the United States and in my opinion the petitioner is in every way qualified to be admitted a citizen of the United States. I do swear (affirm) that the statements of fact I have made in the affidavit to this petition for naturalization subscribed by me are true to the best of knowledge and belief: so HELP ME GOD. how my (Signature of Witness) AND Glee Emmall few (Signature of Witness) WHEN OATH ADMINISTERED BY CLERK OR DEPUTY WHEN OATH ADMINISTERED BY DESIGNATED EXAMINER CLERK OF COURT Subscribed and sworn to (affirmed) before me by above-named peti- Subscribed and sworn to (affirmed) before me by above-named peti- tioner and witnesses in the respective forms of oath shown in said petition tioner and witnesses in the respective forms of oath shown in said petition and affidavit, and filed by said petitioner, in the office of the clerk of said FIL and affidavit at this court at Los Angeles THE 1971 Calif. day of A.D. 19 DEOR S. DISTRICT COURT day of Dec 71 Designated Examiner. this A.D. 19 CENTRAL DISTRICT CENTRAL CLERK. CAV I HEREBY CERTIFY That the foregoing petition for naturalization was by petitioner named herein filed in the office of the clerk of said court Clerk. By at this day of Deputy Clerk. CALIFORNIA A.D. 19 [SEAL] Clerk. By Deputy Clerk. Form N-405 (Rev. 10-20-69) STATISTICS
